      • moveIncludedUnits

        void moveIncludedUnits(VirtualUnit from,
                       VirtualUnit to,
                       Iterable<DocumentaryUnit> included)
                throws PermissionDenied
        Move units included in one virtual collection to another virtual collection.
        Parameters:
        from - the ID of the source VC
        to - the ID of the target VC
        included - a list of unit IDs to move
        Throws:
        PermissionDenied

      • addIncludedUnits

        VirtualUnit addIncludedUnits(VirtualUnit parent,
                             Iterable<DocumentaryUnit> included)
                      throws PermissionDenied
        Add documentary units to be included in a virtual unit as child items.
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent VU
        included - a set of child DUs
        Returns:
        the parent VU
        Throws:
        PermissionDenied

        Throws:
        PermissionDenied

      • getVirtualCollections

        Iterable<VirtualUnit> getVirtualCollections(Entity item)
        Find virtual collections to which this item belongs.
        Parameters:
        item - an item (typically a documentary unit)
        Returns:
        a set of top-level virtual units
